page.title: 06Kilbride Parish Church
page.content:
In our area the oldest church is Kilbride Parish Church. Its rector is {Reverend}Robert Cox.
Kilbride Church was not built on the site of the other church. Parish {Churches}started in the fifth century.
It is built facing the east as the east lets in the sun while the service is taking place. The church is built in shape of a cross and the architecture is Gothic. All the stained glass has been put in over the last twenty years. It was made by a man called Mailes from{Canterbury.
With all the detailed statues and plaques , it gives the church's { religion}a feeling of warmth.
